text: Scoliini is a cosmopolitan tribe of the family Scoliidae. == Genera == Genera within this tribe include:BugGuide - Subfamily ScoliinaeClassification and checklist of Afrotropical mammoth wasps *Austroscolia Betrem, 1927 *Diliacos Saussure & Sichel, 1864 *Laeviscolia Betrem, 1928 *Liacos Guérin-Méneville, 1838 *Megascolia Betrem, 1928 *Microscolia Betrem, 1928 *Mutilloscolia Bradley, 1959 *Pyrrhoscolia Bradley, 1957 *Scolia Fabricius 1775 *Triscolia de Saussure 1863 == References == Category:Parasitic wasps Category:Scoliidae
title: Scoliini
